p: The noise level measurements were carried out during October 2018 for the three selected stations along Elgeish Street in Alexandria City, Egypt. A typical data sheet was created for the selected stations as presented in Tables 7– 10 in addition to Figs 8– 11. The noise level measuring was taken in six separated intervals of the day, each interval is two hours and the noise level was recorded each 15 minutes in these 2 hours. The longitude and latitude position of each selected location were determined and mentioned in the table corresponded to each station.
